application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: T.7 Indian Horse Chestnut - Fell (Terminal Decline). T.8 Indian Horse Chestnut - Fell (Already Removed).T.13 Lime - Holistic reduction to previous points (approx 2m).T.14 & T.15 Lime - Crown lift to 3m from ground level and reduce overextended laterals uniformly by 2m to give well formed appearance.T.21 Lime - Crown lift to 3m from ground level and reduce overextended laterals by 1m in line with main crown.T.59 Yew - 1m lateral reshape of growth over roof line leaving well shaped and in the green.
